aspect of software development and for that reason bring a lot more enthusiasm to my work than many other programmers Ive organized my hundreds of distinct VBA code procedures and SQL query strings nearly any desired application Also having been an attorney before I was a software developer my appreciation of the importance of work documentation sets me apart from other developers in the degree
